text: Mahmood Rasooli (, born May 18, 1998, in Saveh) is an Iranian volleyball player who plays as an Outside hitter for the Iranian club Eefaseram Ardakan VC. == Career == Mahmood Rasooli has played in national Iranian men's U20 volleyball team. Rasooli has a history of playing in Shahrdari Varamin and Sepahan VC teams. He also has a history of playing in Qatar League for Al Arabi team. == Honours == === National team === * 2017 FIVB Volleyball Islamic Championship ** Gold: 2017 * 2018 FIVB Volleyball Junior World Championship ** Silver : 2018 == References == == Other websites == * * Mahmood Rasooli on worldofvolley * Mahmood Rasooli on volleybox Category:People from Tehran Category:Living people
title: Mahmood Rasooli
